```{=html}
<script>
(function(){
  const probes = document.querySelectorAll('.probe');
  probes.forEach(p => {
    const cs = getComputedStyle(p);
    const info = p.nextElementSibling && p.nextElementSibling.classList.contains('computed')
      ? p.nextElementSibling
      : document.createElement('div');
    info.className = 'computed';
    info.textContent = `Computed → family: ${cs.fontFamily}; weight: ${cs.fontWeight}; style: ${cs.fontStyle}`;
    if (!info.parentNode) p.after(info);
  });
})();
</script>
```
